title: Source Condition Double Robust Inference on Functionals of Inverse Problems. (arXiv:2307.13793v1 [stat.ME])
abstract: We consider estimation of parameters defined as linear functionals of solutions to linear inverse problems. Any such parameter admits a doubly robust representation that depends on the solution to a dual linear inverse problem, where the dual solution can be thought as a generalization of the inverse propensity function. We provide the first source condition double robust inference method that ensures asymptotic normality around the parameter of interest as long as either the primal or the dual inverse problem is sufficiently well-posed, without knowledge of which inverse problem is the more well-posed one. Our result is enabled by novel guarantees for iterated Tikhonov regularized adversarial estimators for linear inverse problems, over general hypothesis spaces, which are developments of independent interest.

translated_title: 逆问题函数的源条件双稳健推断
translated_abstract: 本文考虑了线性逆问题解的线性函数参数的估计。任何这样的参数都有一个双稳健表示，该表示依赖于对偶线性逆问题的解，其中对偶解可以被视为逆倾向函数的推广。我们提供了第一个源条件双稳健推断方法，只要原始或对偶逆问题足够良好，无需知道哪个逆问题更良好，就能确保对感兴趣的参数的渐近正态性。我们的结果是通过对线性逆问题的迭代Tikhonov正则化对抗估计器在一般假设空间上的新的保证而实现的，这是一个独立发展的利益。
tldr: 本文提出了一种源条件双稳健推断方法，用于估计线性逆问题解的线性函数参数，无需知道哪个逆问题更良好，该方法能确保对感兴趣的参数的渐近正态性，并提供了对迭代Tikhonov正则化对抗估计器的新保证。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a source condition double robust inference method for estimating linear function parameters of solutions to linear inverse problems, without the need to know which inverse problem is more well-posed. The method ensures asymptotic normality of the parameter of interest and provides novel guarantees for iterated Tikhonov regularized adversarial estimators.
